channel.title: Exp Rates
channel.description:
Hey everyone, I'm not sure if this is the right place but here's my question,
I have been programming my server for about 4 months now. And I've come to the conclusion that I don't know what my exp rates should be? 500 exp per hit, 250, maybe even 100. What do you guys think I should make the exp rates? I am looking for something that's slow pace but is fast enough to keep people playing.

item.title: Exp Rates
item.dc:creator: @vyre-scape vyre-scape
item.description:
@vyre-scape wrote:

I use x40 per one hit. So, if i’d hit a 10, it’d give me 400xp.

Read full topic

item.title: Exp Rates
item.dc:creator: @Shanks Shanks
item.description:
@Shanks wrote:

I’ve decided to gow ith 250 exp per hit. (I meant combat exp xD)

Anyway, It works out. It takes a good 10-15 minutes to get to 40 attack, just think how long it will take to get to 75 or even 99? xD And I don’t get level 9 right away either, so that’s pretty cool.

Read full topic

item.title: Exp Rates
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“TheHolyGrail, post:5, topic:458710”]Lol guys thats way too low. 50x is the lowest it should go for a server imo. @OP, in the past 120x was the perfect rate for my server.[/quote]Depends on the amount the multiplier is multiplying TBH. If a 10 point hit is made, it should give 900 - 1200 xp with a decent multiplier. With a 50x multiplier, that’d go to 4500 per hit. Thats WAY to fast.

Read full topic

item.title: Exp Rates
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

Lol guys thats way too low. 50x is the lowest it should go for a server imo. @OP, in the past 120x was the perfect rate for my server.

Read full topic

item.title: Exp Rates
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

You don’t want it too high or too low. I would say, like ruby, 5 - 7 times faster than runescape.

Read full topic

item.title: Exp Rates
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Like x5-x7 runescapes formula.

Read full topic

item.title: Exp Rates
item.dc:creator: @Carter2 Carter_
item.description:
@Carter2 wrote:

You should use something so players see every level. Not straight from 1 to 9 in one hit. 25x would do this nicely.

Read full topic
